Thanks Secret! Great video quality. Although the audio is slightly out of sync. First I thought it was my pc it's getting quite old, but then I read the above comments. I must say I first noticed the audio delay after 30 mins. It's hardly noticeble but once you have.... well enough said. The video quality is SUPERB on the other hand so I won't download an other 264 rip, but I will rather try to fix this audiotrack.

The wait has always been well worth it. There is one movie I have been looking for and having a hard time finding.  Could you please upload "The Road" with Viggo Mortensen in it.  Also would love "Legion" and " The Book Of Eli" if you have them.  They look like awesome movies.  Again a big thank you in advance.

Ok the problem I am hving is for the xbox when I use yamb to create the 2 channel audio when i click on the two channel file and then you have to unclick the 6 channel the 2 channel is also 6 channel! does that make since. so in the file the 2 channel when clicked on is really a 6 channel too! so I cant paly it on my xbox! it seems like it may be an easy fix but i think secretmyth would have to do it on his end! is anyone else having this problem? all the other ones are working fine! secret myth is the only person I get movies from! so If he dont post it i dont watch it! eveytime i try to get one from someone else it always causes problems! and he always does the 2 channel for us xbox users! So Thank you!

not sure if its me or not, im pretty sure its not me but when i take the 6 channel off with yamb and add the 2 channel its actually just another 6 channel, i had downloaded this once and took care of it and tried to play it on my 360 but it wouldnt play so i re downloaded it and thats when i found the second 6 channel, it would be nice to know how to convert the 6 channel to 2 channel myself so not to bother Secret with this little stuff maybe someone will let me know of such a program until then i will keep searching thanks Secret your awesome u r still my #1 source
